CustomField.description: Bridge Use Previous formula: IF(Override_Advance_Amount__c = 0, Initial_Disbursement_Remaining__c + Reno_Advance_Amount__c, Override_Advance_Amount__c )
CustomField.formula: IF(OR( TEXT(Status__c) = 'Active', TEXT(Status__c) = 'Sold', TEXT(Status__c) = 'Paid Off'), Approved_Advance_Amount_Used__c, Initial_Disbursement_Remaining__c + Approved_Renovation_Holdback__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Status is "Pending" or "In Process", then this will be the Approved Advance Amount for the next Advance. If the Status is "Active", then this will be the amount funded.
